mapper.select: SELECT CASE WHEN alarm_type = 'NT' AND level_no = '1' THEN CONCAT('一级报警',':',tm.thing_name,'(',ta.thing_value,')') WHEN alarm_type = 'NT' AND level_no = '2' THEN CONCAT('二级报警',':',tm.thing_name,'(',ta.thing_value,')') WHEN alarm_type = 'NT' AND level_no = '3' THEN CONCAT('三级报警',':',tm.thing_name,'(',ta.thing_value,')') ELSE alarm_info END AS alarm_info FROM ${dbName}.tbl_alarm ta LEFT JOIN tbl_monitor tm ON tm.thing_code = ta.thing_code WHERE ta.device_code = #{deviceCode} AND ta.alarm_status = '1' AND ta.alarm_type = #{alarmType} AND ta.alarm_time = ( SELECT alarm_time FROM ${dbName}.tbl_alarm WHERE device_code = #{deviceCode} AND alarm_status = '1' AND alarm_type = #{alarmType} ORDER BY alarm_time DESC LIMIT 0,1 ) ORDER BY ta.alarm_time DESC

SELECT temp.device_code FROM ( SELECT ta.device_code FROM ${dbName}.tbl_alarm ta WHERE ta.alarm_id = #{alarmId} UNION SELECT ta.device_code FROM ${dbOldName}.tbl_alarm ta WHERE ta.alarm_id = #{alarmId} ) temp LIMIT 0,1
SELECT level_no FROM ${dbName}.tbl_alarm WHERE device_code = #{deviceCode} AND alarm_type = 'NT' ORDER BY update_time DESC LIMIT 0,1
